entry.data:
CLOUDY
WIDESPREAD DENSE FOG THIS MORNING
SHOWERS LIKELY THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 40 PERCENT

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN RAIN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT
